players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I'm shocked about Alice's death. We should all share any suspicions to find the mafioso."
You: "I agree with Diana that we should share our suspicions. I find it odd that Alice was found dead so suddenly. Let's all be vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We should vote him out to protect the town."

You: "I was saddened by Alice's sudden death and I believe it's important for us to work together to find the real culprit. I don't have any suspicions at the moment, but I will keep a close eye on everyone."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation; Bob is the mafioso. We must vote him out to protect the town and end this quickly."
Diana: "I support Charlie's claim about Bob being the mafioso. We should vote him out to save the town."
